ygData.subject: Re: Old memories die hard.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She lowered her spear and glared at Slayer. As much as it would give me pleasure turning you into scrap metal, she took a deep sigh, I can not disobey

::Spears::

She lowered her spear and glared at Slayer. "As much as it would give 
me pleasure turning you into scrap metal," she took a deep sigh,"I 
can not disobey Master Prebon."  She put her spear away and glared at 
him.  She was starting tohate him as much as he hated her.
The only thing that made her smile was the fact that she bugged him 
more than he bugged her.  She smiled evilly at him.
But in the same token, you should not disobey Master Prebon either."
She smiled and leaned back against the wall near the doorway. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Slayer laughs harshly, watching Spears arm herself. The thought of 
> her thinking she could stand up to him was humorous to Slayer, the 
> bot wondering when Prebon would finally let him scrap her.
> 
> "Go ahead, femm," he says through a growl, his own weapons powering 
> up, "Disobey the Master, and attack me. We'll see how many pieces 
of 
> you are left afterward."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::Spears::
> > 
> > She growled back and pulled out a spear.  She held in next to 
her, 
> > watching every move that Slayer made.
